question: Who among the following is the Highest Paid Author according to Forbes?
explanation: Harry Potter creator JK Rowling has been named the world's most highly-paid author with earnings of Â£72.2m ($95m) this year. The Edinburgh-based writer beat Dan Brown, Stephen King and John Grisham to top Forbes' list of the 10 highest earners in the global industry for the first time in almost 10 years.
